item.title: Leif Garrett - I Was Made For Dancing
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: LLOYD MICHAEL
KY: 8489 / KY: 23902

You’ve kept me
rolling
like a wheel
on a road turning
Round and round
nowhere to go
I’ve got to
find out
If you’re feeling
it too
It’s hard to tell
so heve’s what I do
And every time
I want more
I take you

dancing

are moving
By me and you
you’re such a

moving to dreams

You can see it
in my face
